LanguageData.MasochistPain.stages.0.label: 身上有点疼（受虐狂）
LanguageData.MasochistPain.stages.1.label: 身上比较疼（受虐狂）
LanguageData.MasochistPain.stages.1.description: 啊呀……有点疼，但是我喜欢，继续！
LanguageData.MasochistPain.stages.2.label: 身上非常疼（受虐狂）
LanguageData.MasochistPain.stages.2.description: 嗷啊……我觉什么地方断了……但是这个感觉真的美好！
LanguageData.MasochistPain.stages.3.label: 疼得要昏厥了（受虐狂）
LanguageData.ProsthophileNoProsthetic.stages.0.label: 缺少仿生部件（仿生学神教）
LanguageData.ProsthophileNoProsthetic.stages.0.descri: 肉体是如此地脆弱，我想要一个人造的肢体！
LanguageData.ProsthophileHappy.stages.0.label: 拥有仿生部件（仿生学神教）
LanguageData.ProsthophileHappy.stages.0.description: 我是现代科技的产物了！我比之前活的更好了！
LanguageData.ProsthophileHappy.stages.1.label: transhumanist quite pleased
LanguageData.ProsthophileHappy.stages.1.description: Two artificial parts are better than one. I wish I had more.
LanguageData.ProsthophileHappy.stages.2.label: transhumanist delighted
LanguageData.ProsthophileHappy.stages.2.description: Three artificial parts, and my weak human flesh is receding. But I still want more machine power.
LanguageData.ProsthophileHappy.stages.3.label: transhumanist enchanted
LanguageData.ProsthophileHappy.stages.3.description: Four artificial body parts and I am becoming more than human. But there's still some flesh that needs replacing.
LanguageData.ProsthophileHappy.stages.4.label: transhumanist overjoyed
LanguageData.ProsthophileHappy.stages.4.description: Five artificial body parts! How could an enhanced being like me ever feel sad?
LanguageData.ProsthophileHappy.stages.5.label: machine body is complete
LanguageData.ProsthophobeUnhappy.stages.0.label: 拥有仿生部件（仿生学恐惧）
LanguageData.ProsthophobeUnhappy.stages.0.description: 他们把我变成了一个科技怪物……也不问问我的意见……
LanguageData.ProsthophobeUnhappy.stages.1.label: body purist disgusted
LanguageData.ProsthophobeUnhappy.stages.1.description: Two artificial parts are sullying my natural, pure body. It makes me sick to think of it.
LanguageData.ProsthophobeUnhappy.stages.2.label: body purist violated
LanguageData.ProsthophobeUnhappy.stages.2.description: Three artificial parts violate my body's pure flesh. I shudder when I think of it... and these objects shudder with me.
LanguageData.ProsthophobeUnhappy.stages.3.label: body purist horrified
LanguageData.ProsthophobeUnhappy.stages.3.description: I have four artificial body parts; it's like I'm becoming a robot. What a horrifying sensation.
LanguageData.ProsthophobeUnhappy.stages.4.label: body purist nightmare
LanguageData.ProsthophobeUnhappy.stages.4.description: Five artificial body parts... Is there anything left of me? Or am I just a robot that thinks it's human?
LanguageData.ProsthophobeUnhappy.stages.5.label: I have become what I hate
LanguageData.ProsthophobeUnhappy.stages.5.description: I asked for the exact opposite of this!
One artificial body part was okay, but having two is bothersome. I miss my natural, clean body.
I have three artificial body parts. Even if they're necessary, I still wish I could be natural again.
Four artificial body parts. I click and creak when I move. I wish I could just be a healthy again, without these reminders of pain.
Five artificial body parts is too much. It's like I'm becoming an android.
LanguageData.BrawlerUnhappy.stages.0.label: 格斗者持有远程武器
LanguageData.BrawlerUnhappy.stages.0.description: 我可讨厌远程攻击敌人了。我想和敌人正面单挑！
LanguageData.PyromaniacHappy.stages.0.label: 纵火狂持有燃烧武器
LanguageData.PyromaniacHappy.stages.0.description: 这让我想起了激情与火焰。我很开心。
LanguageData.ClothedNudist.stages.0.label: 衣物束缚
LanguageData.ClothedNudist.stages.0.description: 我崇尚裸体主义，但是我却不得不穿着衣服。虽然能勉强忍受，但我就是觉得浑身难受也不自由。
LanguageData.HappyNude.stages.0.label: 快乐的裸体
LanguageData.HappyNude.stages.0.description: 我裸体我快乐！我感到如此的自由和不受约束，感受到与四周环境的紧密结合！
LanguageData.NightOwlDuringTheDay.stages.0.label: 夜猫子（白天）
LanguageData.NightOwlDuringTheNight.stages.0.label: 夜猫子（晚上）
LanguageData.Greedy.stages.0.label: 没有令人印象深刻的卧室（贪心）
LanguageData.Greedy.stages.0.description: 我很贪婪。我想要一间真正令人印象深刻的卧室。
LanguageData.Greedy.stages.1.label: 没有令人印象深刻的卧室（贪心）
LanguageData.Greedy.stages.1.description: 我很贪婪。我的房间很可怜！我想要一间真正令人印象深刻的卧室。
LanguageData.Greedy.stages.2.label: 没有令人印象深刻的卧室（贪心）
LanguageData.Greedy.stages.2.description: 我很贪婪。我的房间很不好。我想要一间真正令人印象深刻的卧室。
LanguageData.Greedy.stages.3.label: 没有令人印象深刻的卧室（贪心）
LanguageData.Greedy.stages.3.description: 我很贪婪。我的房间不够好。我想要一间真正令人印象深刻的卧室。
LanguageData.Greedy.stages.4.label: 没有令人印象深刻的卧室（贪心）
LanguageData.Greedy.stages.4.description: 我很贪婪。我的房间还是不够好。我想要一间真正令人印象深刻的卧室。
LanguageData.Jealous.stages.0.label: 妒忌{0}的卧室
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.0.label: 可怕的卧室（苦行者）
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.0.description: 我的卧室就应该是这个样子，简单，虔诚。
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.1.label: 丑陋的卧室（苦行者）
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.1.description: 我的卧室就应该是这个样子，简单，虔诚。
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.2.label: 乏味的卧室（苦行者）
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.2.description: 我的卧室简单又虔诚，我喜欢。
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.5.label: 令人印象深刻的卧室（苦行者）
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.5.description: 我不喜欢令人印象深刻的卧室。
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.6.label: 令人印象深刻的卧室（苦行者）
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.6.description: 我不喜欢令人印象深刻的卧室。
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.7.label: 令人印象深刻的卧室（苦行者）
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.7.description: 我不喜欢令人印象深刻的卧室。
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.8.label: 令人印象深刻的卧室（苦行者）
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.8.description: 我不喜欢令人印象深刻的卧室。
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.9.label: 令人印象深刻的卧室（苦行者）
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.9.description: 我不喜欢令人印象深刻的卧室。
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.10.label: 令人印象深刻的卧室（苦行者）
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.10.description: 我不喜欢令人印象深刻的卧室。
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.11.label: 令人印象深刻的卧室（苦行者）
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.11.description: 我不喜欢令人印象深刻的卧室。
